name: Fate (itch) (Sylaren)
description:
A strangely poetic game; the result of experimenting with the absence of color.

The goal is for your color to dominate over the other player's color. As players move around, their trail remains, bleeding and spreading throughout the void.

Firing (and landing) bullets cause the player's color to pulse throughout the void, either bleaching or darkening the area by a shade.

White Sphere

Movement: W, A, S, D

Fire: Left Shift

Black Sphere

Movement: Arrow Keys

Fire: " / "

Made using Processing in 2014.
